name: iSpy-ify (EPILEPSY WARN!)
description: Turns every level/menu into eye-bleeding brain candy like the hit level iSpyWithMyLittleEye by Voxicat!!! Also includes some funny "eye closing/opening" sections that randomly spawn as you play. :)

blinking-eye-enabled.name: Blinking Eye Enabled
blinking-eye-enabled.description: Enables the feature where an eye appears and the level gets dark as it blinks (like the part in iSpy.)
